channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Leftist Think Tanks Twist Facts To Manipulate Congress On Obamacare
item.description: Groups on the left know full well that allowing the enhanced subsidies to expire as scheduled wouldn’t cause a catastrophe for most families.

item.title: Trump's beef import plan ignores key issue squeezing American cattle ranchers

item.title: Stanford athlete turned wealth guru had everything he wanted by 30, but was miserable: ‘I had the high-paying job, the title, the house, the car’
item.description: “The 5 Types of Wealth” author Sahil Bloom had all the trappings of success—but he quickly realized that money doesn't buy happiness.

item.title: The Week: Trump’s Ballroom Blitz
item.description: Plus: Baseball has never seen quite the likes of Shohei Ohtani.

item.title: Trump Should Drop His Damages Claim Against DOJ
item.description: An ethical conflict that can only be resolved by acting ethically.

item.title: Federal judge strikes down Biden-era transgender regulation
item.description: A federal judge struck down a Biden-era rule expanding anti-discrimination protections to transgender healthcare after 15 Republican-led states sued.

item.title: Trump Should Stop Sharing Intel With The U.K. Until It Punishes Chinese Espionage
item.description: The Starmer government must urgently reevaluate its approach to China to sustain the trust and confidence of its closest ally, the U.S.

item.title: Inflation is still ‘the dog that didn’t bark’ as delayed CPI report shows cooler-than-expected rise to 3%
item.description: Chris Zaccarelli of Northlight Asset Management told Fortune that inflation reminds him of "a Sherlock Holmes’ story."

item.title: U.S. conducts its 10th strike on alleged drug boat, killing six
item.description: The U.S. has conducted another strike on an alleged drug boat in the Caribbean, bringing the total number of vessels hit to 10.

item.title: Inflation for September came in cooler than expected

item.title: Dems lagging behind GOP on Asian American outreach could make or break blue state election, DNC leader warns
item.description: DNC co-chair Shasti Conrad warns Democrats risk losing New Jersey's gubernatorial election due to insufficient outreach to Asian American voters.

item.title: After Losing At SCOTUS, Wisconsin Finds A New Way To ‘Target’ Catholic Charities
item.description: Wisconsin is seeking to deny a tax exemption not only to the CCB, but to all such religious and nonreligious organizations across the state.

item.title: If You Care More About Policing The Right Than Fighting The Left, You’re Part Of The Problem
item.description: We have created a demoralized right, perpetually apologizing for existing while the left advances unimpeded.

item.title: Big Government Locks Young People Out of the American Dream

item.title: ‘Now it’s like, ‘OK, you’re in office. I’m still getting done dirty at the grocery store”: Hispanic voters’ inflation fatigue weighs on Trump polling
item.description: The October survey from AP-NORC finds that 25% of Hispanic adults have a “somewhat” or “very” favorable view of Trump.
